title: Dragon's Fury
description: The evil Lord V and his lovely wife, Lady Flame have taken over Cave Kingdom. However, the Dragon King has returned and is raising an army to retake his kingdom. Lady Shaelynn Keeper has had a curse put on her and her son Zeth and his friend Chase secretly leave to find a cure. They must sneak into Cave Kingdom to do so. Lady Flame discovers her husband's evil plot to steal her treasures. What happens and will Zeth and Chase be caught?
author: L.L. Hansen
